## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.expand() method

Expands the accordion with the given value(s).

If the value is currently collapsed, it will be expanded. If the value is currently expanded, it will remain expanded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
expand(value: T | T[]): void;
```

</th><th>

value


</td><td>

T \| T\[\]


</td><td>

The value or array of values to expand.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
